DataElement.preferredName: Concordance With Local Pathology Report Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A yes/no response to indicate whether the review of tumor tissue is consistent with the findings of the Local Pathology Report for this case.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An agreement of findings._Used to indicate the presence of something or someone._Of or belonging to a restricted area or locality._A report that provides a description of the gross and microscopic examination of the specimen and is used to make a diagnosis and to determine treatment. It defines which structures and organs of the body are involved by the tumor, verifies the primary site of the cancer and describes the extent to which it has spread.

Property.preferredDefinition: Used to indicate the presence of something or someone.:Of or belonging to a restricted area or locality.:A report that provides a description of the gross and microscopic examination of the specimen and is used to make a diagnosis and to determine treatment. It defines which structures and organs of the body are involved by the tumor, verifies the primary site of the cancer and describes the extent to which it has spread.

Concepts.definition: Used to indicate the presence of something or someone.
Of or belonging to a restricted area or locality.

A report that provides a description of the gross and microscopic examination of the specimen and is used to make a diagnosis and to determine treatment. It defines which structures and organs of the body are involved by the tumor, verifies the primary site of the cancer and describes the extent to which it has spread.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Any specific activity undertaken during the course of a clinical study or research protocol.

DataElementConcept.origin: CPTAC: Clinical Proteomic Tumor Analysis Consortium
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 7/27/20 jk released per July metrics rpt.  4/29/20 jk DEC CUI mapping revised for consistency with other Concordance CDEs.  1/22/20 jk released per CPTAC SME's review of PRAD Path Review CDE set. 1/6/20 jk created for CPTAC Path Review CRF; applicable to all tumor types.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: The review of tumor tissue is
ReferenceDocuments.description: The review of tumor tissue is consistent with the findings of the Local Pathology Report for this case

DataElement.origin: CPTAC: Clinical Proteomic Tumor Analysis Consortium
DataElement.changeDescription: 8/17/21 jk added CM Path Rpt CSI. 7/12/21 jk added HNSCC Path Rpt CSI.  5/14/20 jk Released per SME (NGM) review and approval email.  4/29/20 jk versioned to use new DEC version.  1/22/20 jk released per CPTAC SME's review of PRAD Path Review CDE set. 1/7/20 jk created for CPTAC Path Review and Local Path CRFs; applicable to all tumor types.
DataElement.administrativeNotes: 8/4/22 Added CSI for CPTAC CHOL Local Path per jk. MR;  8/12/22 Removed incorrect Path Review classifications and replaced with Local Path classifications, per JK.  MR;
